japanese: あー……疲れた……。
translation: Ahh... I'm so tired...

japanese:
なんとか無事に終わったね……。
想像よりずっと疲れた……。
translation:
Phew, we managed to finish it without a hitch...
I'm much more exhausted than I imagined...

japanese:
ああ……こんなに緊張するとは……。
やっと一息つけるな……。
translation:
Ahh...
I never expected to have been this nervous...
Finally, I can take a breather...

japanese: そうだね……。
translation: That's right...

japanese: 風太郎、入っていいか？
translation: Futaro, can I come in?

japanese: ああ、いいぞ。
translation: Yeah, sure.

japanese: よ！　お疲れさん。
translation: Yo! Good work out there.

japanese:
って、なんだなんだ？
ずいぶんとぐったりしてるな。
translation:
Woah, what now?
Why do you look so worn out?

japanese:
疲れもする。
緊張しっぱなしだったんだぞ？
translation:
It's tiring, you know.
I was tense the whole time.

japanese:
そんなことで大丈夫か？
これから五月ちゃんと２人でやってこうってのに。
translation:
Are you okay with that?
From now on, it'll be just you and Itsuki-chan,
ya know.

japanese: お父さん。
translation: Father.

japanese:
おっと、五月ちゃん、
そんなに改まらなくてもいいんだぜ？
translation:
Hey, Itsuki-chan, you don't have to be so formal.
It's not necessary.

japanese:
いえ、節目の日ですから。
改めて、ご挨拶をさせてください。
translation:
Well, it's a milestone of a day.
Please allow me to greet you properly.

japanese: これから上杉家の一員として、よろしくお願いします。
translation:
From now on, as a member of the Uesugi family,
I ask for your support.

japanese:
おう、こっちこそよろしく。
うちの馬鹿息子を頼むぜ。
translation:
Sure, same here.
Take care of my idiotic son.

japanese: ふふ、その点は任せてください。
translation: Heheh, you can leave that to me.

japanese: おい、誰が馬鹿息子だ。
translation: Hey, who's the idiotic son?

japanese:
なんだ、不満か？
勉強馬鹿息子にするか？
translation:
What's the matter?
You don't like it? Should I call you
the idiotic son who's bad at studying?

japanese: あー、もういい。
translation: Ah, forget it.

japanese: あと、教師としても頑張ってな。
translation: And also, do your best as a teacher.

japanese: はい、ありがとうございます。
translation: Yes, I will.

japanese:
なんなら風太郎のことは後回しでいいぞ。
生徒優先でいい先生になってくれ！
translation:
If anything, you can put Futaro aside for now.
Be a good teacher, who prioritizes her students!

japanese: なっ……！
translation: Wha?!

japanese:
こいつな、意外と拗ねたりするかもしれねぇが
気にしないでいいからよ。
translation:
This guy might get sulky unexpectedly,
but you don't have to worry about it.

japanese: 親父！　勝手なことを言うなっ！
translation: Dad! Stop saying whatever you want!

japanese: ……ふふっ！
translation: ...Heheh!

japanese:
おい、五月。
親父の言ってることは無視していいからな。
translation: Hey, Itsuki. You can ignore what Dad is saying.

japanese:
そんなことできないよ。
風太郎をここまで育ててきた
お父さんのアドバイスなんだから。
translation:
But, I can't do that.
It's advice from your father,
who's raised you up to this point, Futaro.

japanese:
そういうことだな！
ガハハッ！
translation: That's right! Gahaha!

japanese: ぐっ……！
translation: Ggh...!

japanese:
まあ、俺だってな、お前には
先生として頑張ってほしいと思ってるわけだし――
translation: Well, ya know, even I want you to do your best as a teacher%p-2;――

japanese: あ、そういや親父。
translation: Oh, speaking of which, Dad.

japanese: なんだ？
translation: What is it?

japanese:
親父の恩師なんだよな？
五月のお母さん。
translation: She was your mentor, right? Itsuki's mother.

japanese: ああ、まあな。
translation: Well, I guess.

japanese: それじゃ――
translation: In that case%p-2;――

japanese: お兄ちゃん、入るよ。
translation: Big bro, can I come in?

japanese:
着替え終わった？
スーツ返してくるから、持ってくね。
translation:
Did you finish changing?
I'll return your suit.

japanese:
あ、ああ。
サンキュー、らいは。
translation:
Ah, yeah.
Thanks, Raiha.

japanese: んじゃ、俺も行くかな。
translation: Alright, I'll take off too, then.

japanese:
え？
まだ話は――
translation:
Huh?
We still have things to talk about%p-2;――

japanese: そんじゃ、後は若いおふたりでな。
translation: Alrighty, have fun, you two newlyweds.

japanese: ……なあ、聞かなくてよかったのか？
translation: ...Hey, was it better not to ask?

japanese: なにを？
translation: About that?

japanese:
お母さんのことだよ。
どんな教師だったのか、とか。
translation:
About your mother.
About what kind of teacher she was, for example.

japanese:
……うん、いいんだ。
きっとこれからも、聞かないと思うな。
translation:
Yeah...it's fine.
I probably won't ask about that any time soon.

japanese:
私はお母さんになりたいわけじゃない。
なる必要もない。
translation:
I don't want to become my mother.
There's no need for it.

japanese: それを教えてくれたのはあなただよ？
translation: You're the one who taught me that, right?

japanese:
……ああ、そうだった。
野暮なこと聞いちまったな。
translation:
...Ah, yeah, that's right.
I asked something stupid.

japanese: ううん、いいの。
translation: No, it's fine.

japanese:
思い返してみたら……
本当に、あなたに出会ってから
私の人生はすっかり変わっちゃった。
translation:
When I look back...
truly, since I met you, my life has completely changed.

japanese:
色々なことでぶつかって、色々なことを教えられて。
出会わなかった自分を想像できないくらい。
translation:
I've clashed and learned so many things.
I can't imagine the version of myself
that didn't meet you.

japanese: それはお互い様だ。
translation: That goes both ways.

japanese:
（思えば、学食で五月と出会って、
　そこからすべてが変わり始めたんだよな）
translation:
(Come to think of it, I met Itsuki at the cafeteria,
 and everything started to change from there.)

japanese: まったく……最悪な出会いだった。
translation: Man... That was the worst first encounter.

japanese: あっ、ひどい。
translation: Ah, you're horrible.

japanese:
お前と出会ってから俺の人生も様変わりだ。
諸悪の根源め。
translation:
Since I met you, my life has also completely changed.
You're the root of all evil.

japanese:
こっちのセリフだけど？
こんなにデリカシーのない人がいるなんて、
衝撃だったんだから。
translation:
But isn't that my line?
It was shocking to encounter someone
so lacking in delicacy.

japanese:
風太郎って
デリカシーのないことは平気で言えるのに、
キスではすっごく緊張してたよね。
translation:
Futaro, you're fine with saying things
without delicacy, but you were incredibly nervous
during the kiss, right?

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
誓いのキスの時、ブルブル震えちゃってたでしょ？
失敗しちゃうかと思った。
translation:
During the vow kiss, you were trembling, remember?
I thought it might not work.

japanese: あれは……！
translation: That was...!

japanese: これが初めてじゃないのに。
translation: Even though it's not the first time.

japanese:
し、仕方ねーだろ！
今日はみんな見てたし！
translation: Well, what can you do! Everyone was watching today!

japanese:
つーかなぁ、あの卒業旅行と言えば
お前のほうだって――
translation:
Actually, speaking of that graduation trip,
it was more on your end, right%p-2;――

japanese:
わーっ！　ごめんごめん！
謝るからそれ以上は言わないで～！
translation:
Uwah! I'm sorry, I'm sorry!
Please don't say any more!

japanese: だったら最初から持ち出すなよ。
translation:
If that's the case,
don't bring it up in the first place.

japanese: ふふ、本当にごめんってば。
translation: Heheh, sorry, I really am.

japanese:
……いまとなっては、
それもいい思い出ではあるんだ。
出会いのこともね。
translation:
Looking back now, those are also good memories.
Including that encounter.

japanese:
あの出会いがなかったら、
沖縄での出来事がなかったら……。
translation:
If we hadn't had that encounter,
if we hadn't had the events in Okinawa...

japanese:
ああ、こうして２人でいることも
なかったかもしれない。
translation: Yeah, we might not be here, together as a couple.

japanese:
だから、あんな形だったけど、
風太郎と出会えてよかったって心から思ってる。
translation:
That's why, even though it happened in that way,
I truly feel fortunate to have met you.
From the bottom of my heart.

japanese: 俺もだ。
translation: I feel the same way as you.

japanese:
いまこうしてあなたといることが、
人生最高の出来事なんだ。
translation:
Being together with you like this,
is the greatest event in my life.

japanese: なに言ってんだよ、五月。
translation: What are you saying, Itsuki?

japanese: え？
translation: Huh?

japanese: いまもすげぇ幸せだけどな、まだまだこれからだろ？
translation:
Even now, we're incredibly happy,
but there's still so much more to come, right?
Ah...

japanese:
俺たちの幸せはここが最高じゃない。
お前と２人でなら、もっともっと幸せな未来を
作り上げていける。
translation:
Our happiness isn't at its peak here.
If it's the two of us,
we can create an even happier future.

japanese: ……うんっ！
translation: ...Yes!

japanese:
（最悪な出会いも、たくさんの衝突も、
　すべてがいい思い出で――）
translation: (Even with the worst first encounter, and all those clashes%p-2;――%p;)

japanese:
ずっと、一緒に。
私たちの最高を永遠にしていこう。
translation:
Together, always.
Let's make our best moments ones to last for eternity.

japanese:
ああ、当たり前だ。
そう誓ったんだからな。
translation:
Yeah, of course.
That's what we vowed to do.
